name: part_005
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】あくあ色ふぇすてぃばる。【#湊あくあ4周年記念】 [O4Ip7gZQOts]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Minato Aqua and Houshou Marine perform 'Fudepen ~Ballpen~' with guitar and bass.
MC segment where Aqua and Marine discuss their performance and K-ON!
Announcement for the next song performance featuring Amane Kanata.

subtitles.original: 待ってて 筆で
subtitles.english: Wait for me with a brush

subtitles.original: ごめんね ボールペンを
subtitles.english: Sorry, I'm letting my ballpoint pen...

subtitles.original: おやすみさせて
subtitles.english: ...take a break

subtitles.original: 君の笑顔 想像して
subtitles.english: Imagining your smile

subtitles.original: いいとこ 見せたくなるよ
subtitles.english: Makes me want to show you my best side

subtitles.original: 情熱のボールペンを
subtitles.english: Grasping my ballpoint pen of passion

subtitles.original: 握りしめ 振り向かなきゃ
subtitles.english: I mustn't look back

subtitles.original: 愛を込めて ぐるぐると
subtitles.english: With all my love, round and round

subtitles.original: さあ 書き出そう
subtitles.english: Now let's start writing

subtitles.original: 受け取った 君に 幸せが
subtitles.english: So that the happiness will

subtitles.original: 繋がるように
subtitles.english: Connect to you who received it

subtitles.original: 夢を見せて ぐるぐると
subtitles.english: Show me a dream, round and round

subtitles.original: 違う色 踊る
subtitles.english: Different colors dancing

subtitles.original: 頑張れ 筆で
subtitles.english: Go for it, with my brush

subtitles.original: ここまで 来たから
subtitles.english: Because I've come this far

subtitles.original: かなり 本気よ
subtitles.english: I'm quite serious

subtitles.original: 唯〜！今日のライブ最高だったぞ！
subtitles.english: Yui~! Today's live was the best!

subtitles.original: 唯！最高だったぞ！
subtitles.english: Yui! It was the best!

subtitles.original: 練習の甲斐あったな！
subtitles.english: The practice paid off!

subtitles.original: 唯〜！最高だったじゃないか！
subtitles.english: Yui~! Wasn't it the best?!

subtitles.original: 軽音部、唯、バンドやろうよ！バンド！
subtitles.english: Light Music Club, Yui, let's start a band! A band!

subtitles.original: 軽音部だよ軽音部！
subtitles.english: It's the Light Music Club, the Light Music Club!

subtitles.original: 軽音部、軽音部、リッちゃん、軽音部、リッちゃん
subtitles.english: Light Music Club, Light Music Club, Ricchan, Light Music Club, Ricchan

subtitles.original: え、リッちゃんって誰？
subtitles.english: Wait, who's Ricchan?

subtitles.original: マリンなんですけど…
subtitles.english: It's Marine, but...

subtitles.original: 船長？
subtitles.english: Senchou?

subtitles.original: 船長なんですけど…リッちゃん、リッちゃんは？
subtitles.english: It's Senchou, but... where's Ricchan?

subtitles.original: リッちゃんって誰？
subtitles.english: Who's Ricchan?

subtitles.original: マリンなんですけど…
subtitles.english: It's Marine...

subtitles.original: 俺、俺の名前忘れないでもらっていいですか？
subtitles.english: Could you please not forget my name?

subtitles.original: ちょっと待って待って待って、さっきまでなんか軽音部ごっこしてたじゃん！
subtitles.english: Wait, wait, wait, weren't we just roleplaying the Light Music Club?!

subtitles.original: あくあ船長、さっきからさ、ギター、エアギターしすぎて肩がカクカクになっちゃったんだけど
subtitles.english: Aqua-senchou, my shoulders are all stiff from doing too much air guitar earlier

subtitles.original: エアとか言うな！本気、エアじゃないから！
subtitles.english: Don't say air! It's serious, it's not air!

subtitles.original: エアじゃなかったの？
subtitles.english: It wasn't air?

subtitles.original: ちゃんとやってたじゃんか！
subtitles.english: I was doing it for real!

subtitles.original: 弾いてた気分だったんだ…
subtitles.english: I felt like I was playing...

subtitles.original: いやでもギター持ってる姿あんまりないからさ、これせっかくだから、ちょ、撮りますか？
subtitles.english: Well, since we don't often see you with a guitar, shall we take a picture while we're at it?

subtitles.original: 撮りますか。
subtitles.english: Let's do it.

subtitles.original: すごい。ちなみに船長、それベースだよ。
subtitles.english: Wow. By the way, Senchou, that's a bass.

subtitles.original: これベース？！
subtitles.english: This is a bass?!

subtitles.original: ベースでした…
subtitles.english: It was a bass...

subtitles.original: これベースだよ、こうやって弾いてるけどベースだよ、こうやってやらないのかな？
subtitles.english: That's a bass. You're playing it like this, but it's a bass. Don't you do it like this?

subtitles.original: こうだね、こうだね。
subtitles.english: Like this, like this.

subtitles.original: あ、こうやってやればよかった。
subtitles.english: Ah, I should have done it like this.

subtitles.original: じゃあちょっとやろうよ、やり損なったから。
subtitles.english: Then let's do it a bit, since we missed out.

subtitles.original: 船長これね、ジャーン、ジャーン。見て、激しいこの首の動き。
subtitles.english: Senchou, this is it. *Strum*, *strum*. Look at this intense head movement.

subtitles.original: ジャーン、ジャーン。
subtitles.english: *Strum*, *strum*.

subtitles.original: 痛い痛い痛い痛い、さっきから当たってんのよ、ギターが。
subtitles.english: Ow, ow, ow, ow, the guitar keeps hitting me.

subtitles.original: 痛いよ、ぶつかりまくってるっていう。
subtitles.english: It hurts, they're constantly clashing.

subtitles.original: 痛いよ、肩肩が、ボロボロになっちゃう。
subtitles.english: It hurts, my shoulders are getting wrecked.

subtitles.original: 大丈夫？あくあ。当たってる痛いよ。
subtitles.english: Are you okay, Aqua? It hurts when it hits.

subtitles.original: あ、あ、大丈夫？当た、当たるけど。
subtitles.english: Ah, are you okay? It hits, though.

subtitles.original: やりみたいだね。あくあ、大丈夫よ。
subtitles.english: It's like a spear. Aqua, it's okay.

subtitles.original: あくあ傷だらけにするの悲しいな。
subtitles.english: It's sad to leave Aqua covered in bruises.

subtitles.original: 痛い、おかしいだろ。痛い、痛い、怖い怖い怖い怖いって。
subtitles.english: It hurts, that's not right. It hurts, it hurts, scary scary scary scary.

subtitles.original: あくあ何で離れてくの？！怖いって！寂しいよあくあ！
subtitles.english: Aqua, why are you moving away?! You're saying it's scary! I'm lonely, Aqua!

subtitles.original: ほら戻って戻って。
subtitles.english: Come on, come back, come back.

subtitles.original: ねえ、勝手に弾いてる。ねえ船長、ギタリストの才能あるかも。
subtitles.english: Hey, you're playing on your own. Hey Senchou, you might have talent as a guitarist.

subtitles.original: これベースだよ、ベース。これベースだったわ。
subtitles.english: This is a bass, a bass. It was a bass.

subtitles.original: どう？何でこの曲選んだの？
subtitles.english: How was it? Why did you choose this song?

subtitles.original: あのね、何か船長を見るとさ、軽音を思い出すっていうか。
subtitles.english: Well, you see, whenever I look at you Senchou, it reminds me of K-ON!

subtitles.original: あくあ、それ結構鋭い。
subtitles.english: Aqua, that's quite sharp.

subtitles.original: 鋭い？
subtitles.english: Sharp?

subtitles.original: 船長ね、実はね、本当に軽音とマジ同い…いや、同じ感じで。
subtitles.english: Senchou, actually, really the same age as K-ON... no, in the same way.

subtitles.original: 本当に何か、本当に唯たちと一緒に卒業していったまであるレベルで、一緒に時を過ごしてきたの。
subtitles.english: Really, on a level where I practically graduated along with Yui and the others, we spent that time together.

subtitles.original: 待って、船長の時代って軽音あんの？何これ。
subtitles.english: Wait, was K-ON around in Senchou's era? What's this?

subtitles.original: 何これハート、若いTikTokの。
subtitles.english: What's this heart? The young TikTok one.

subtitles.original: 軽音…あ、あったわ！ふざけんなお前！あるわよ！軽音と一緒に時を過ごしてきたって言ってんだろうが！
subtitles.english: K-ON... Ah, it was! Don't mess with me! It was! I told you I spent my time with K-ON!

subtitles.original: やってんだろうが！もうずっと手が止まらないんだけど、お前助けて、誰か止めて、右手を止めて。
subtitles.english: I'm doing it! My hand won't stop moving, help me, someone stop it, stop my right hand.

subtitles.original: や、でもね、せっかくギター持ったから、あくあに、何かギターを使った秘技を教えたいかなと思って。
subtitles.english: Well, but since we have guitars, I thought I'd teach Aqua some secret technique using a guitar.

subtitles.original: 本当ですか？
subtitles.english: Really?

subtitles.original: ちょっと普通に弾き方ずっとやっててね、新しい弾き方がね、今浮かんできた。
subtitles.english: Just keep playing normally, okay? A new way of playing just came to me.

subtitles.original: これベースだけどね。
subtitles.english: This is a bass, though.

subtitles.original: そうこれベース。何度も言うけどさ。じゃあ行きますよ、マリン。秘技！
subtitles.english: Yeah, it's a bass. I've said it many times. Okay, here I go, Marine. Secret technique!

subtitles.original: はい、走り弾き！
subtitles.english: Yes, running-strum!

subtitles.original: このまま去っていけるっていう。
subtitles.english: And I can just leave like this.

subtitles.original: じゃあね、あくあ！4周年おめでとう！
subtitles.english: See ya, Aqua! Congrats on your 4th anniversary!

subtitles.original: 待ってー！
subtitles.english: Wait up!

subtitles.original: 天音かなた
subtitles.english: Amane Kanata

subtitles.original: 湊あくあ
subtitles.english: Minato Aqua

subtitles.original: NEXT SONG
subtitles.english: NEXT SONG

subtitles.original: ハウトゥー世界征服 / 湊あくあ 天音かなた
subtitles.english: How-to World Domination / Minato Aqua, Amane Kanata
